Use this utility method to test if you've configured your AndroidManifest.xml properly.

Parameters:

Throws:
IllegalStateException - if your manifest is not configured properly. The exception description explains what is mis-configured.

Factory method which generates AdRequest objects used to hold request configuration details.

Parameters:

Returns:

Returns:

getAdPromptForZone

public SnakkAdPrompt getAdPromptForZone(Context context,
                                        String zone)
Factory method which generates AdPrompt object using zone.

Parameters:
context - Application context that will be used to show Interstial Ad
zone - Identifier of ad placement to be loaded.
Returns:
An AdPrompt object that is ready to be loaded. Call SnakkAdPrompt.load() to initiate ad request.
